General.Name: RoboRobo Co. Ltd
General.Description: RoboRobo Co., Ltd. develops and provides education services in robot, coding, and STEAM areas in South Korea and internationally. It develops hardware and software products, including machines, electronics, and control programs. The company offers robots and coding products; and STEAM education tools. RoboRobo Co., Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Seoul, South Korea.
